roleset.name: to initiate change
roleset.note: CATALYZE-V NOTES: example found in the BNC (from catalyze.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: CFCs tend to inhibit the flow of infra-red radiation through theatmosphere; and [they]-1 help to *trace*-1 catalyze the breakdown of the ozone layer.
example.arg: the breakdown of the ozone layer
